| HistoryText             = The Shaolin Scientist Squad was a group founded by [[Ran Shen (Earth-616)|Ran Shen]] to stand against both the totalitarianism of the Communist East and the runaway oligarchism of the Capitalist West.{{r|Captain America Vol 7 #13}} Their fighting style makes use of the techniques of shaolin monks.

They were active as street surgeons in Chinatown, where they were discovered and defeated by the [[Frank Castle (Earth-616)|Punisher]].{{r|Punisher Vol 8 #3}}

Later, a group of their agents tried to assassinate a rich Wall Street stockbroker, but were stopped by Captain America.{{r|Captain America Vol 7 #17}}
